name: Plaza Technologies
description: Maya is the flagship AI-powered assistant from Plaza Technologies, built specifically for the real estate industry. It goes far beyond WhatsApp pre-screening, automating both lead qualification and administrative workflows—such as invoice handling, maintenance requests, and contract support—without overloading your team. Available 24/7, Maya engages leads, tenants, and property owners through personalized, efficient interactions on WhatsApp and voice calls. With seamless integrations to CRMs and ERPs, built-in credit analysis, and smart triaging, Maya empowers real estate businesses to boost conversions, reduce manual effort, and deliver faster, more effective service at scale.
focus_areas: AI agents to automate real estate operations, boosting efficiency, lead conversion, and customer service at scale.
Messaging - Manage conversations with costumers at scale.
